response.job_title: Mechatronic Engineer | Political Scientist | Master in Public Policy MPP (C) and Master in Education.
response.summary:
Professional with multidisciplinary studies in mechatronics engineering and political science, complementing with studies in statistics, political analysis and public policy. Disciplined, adaptive and persistent. A human being in constant formation. As a professional, I am willing to work to develop and make advances that are useful and/or transform society from the position in which I found myself. Passionate about social topics, technology and innovation, with the spirit of a critical leader that allows a team to meet its objectives.

Experience in education, research, design and development of machinery equipment, as well as working with vulnerable communities. Also interested in analytical topics, human behavior and data. I speak Spanish, English and French. Comfort zones bother me, so I always look for challenges and goals that involve change, adaptation and learning.

"Jhonatan Rosas, Mechatronics student at the National University, (...) has proven to be a natural leader in what has to do with innovation, but also in advancing reconciliation processes from now on" (Newspaper EL TIEMPO, 2015).
response.skills: Redacción, Python, R, Ciencias de los materiales, Moodle, Investigación y desarrollo (I+D), Estudio de suelos, Neumática, LabVIEW, Simulink, Biomasa, AutoCAD, Arduino, Educación, Ingeniería, Política, Gobierno, Emprendimiento, Enseñanza superior, Responsabilidad
